At its adrenalyn-filled heart, Destiny 2 is a first person shooter. As such, the developers have put a lot of love into making the guns extremely fun to use. You have tons of different types of weapons too, ranging from the revolver-esque Hand Cannons to the plasma Fusion Rifles to Rocket Launchers and even Chainsaw Swords! I recommend taking some time in the EDZ or Cosmodrome to mess around with the guns and get used to them.

Click the trigger to move on!
